name: Analyze Coverage
prompt: Review the latest coverage report and list all uncovered lines and branches.

name: Identify Opportunities
prompt: For each uncovered region, determine if it is due to missing tests, unreachable code, or error handling.

name: Suggest Improvements
prompt: Propose specific changes to code or tests to cover these regions. Prioritize decision/branch coverage.

name: Implement Changes
prompt: Add or refactor tests and code to cover the identified gaps. Use property-based, edge case, and integration tests as needed.

name: Validate
prompt: Re-run coverage tools and confirm that coverage has increased. Report new uncovered regions if any remain.

name: Iterate
prompt: Repeat steps 1-5 until coverage goals are met or all practical paths are covered.
